name: Scramble (itch) (cjahwaan)
description: So if you've seen or played Wordle and heard that the New York Times is buying the rights and you need your wordle fix and also thought, “wow this is too hard and I just wanna guess words to my heart's content”, well I’ve gotta game for you. Scramble is a word guessing game. It's free and you don’t have to connect to Twitter and post and clutter your friends' timelines. It’s pay what you want but a $2 donation would be stellar! Thank you for reading this far, check the game out for yourself and give the trailer a watch.
